title.price: Makoto - Price of Website, E-Store, Graphics

web.desc: Makoto - Web developer. Experienced web developer offers modern, responsive designs, SEO optimization and technical support. Specializing in JavaScript, VueJS, React and more. Create exceptional websites with us!

Props.diamond: With a well-designed website you can count on high profits and access to customers.
Props.pen: The logo is the most important, because it is what customers see and what they most associate with.
Props.meta: A lot can be achieved with well designed social media images.

Specifically.specifically: So what do I do specifically?

Frontend.main: I have been creating websites for 6 years. I create them currently in nuxtjs and gatsbyjs. I try my best to make each website look very good.

Graphic.main: I have been working in graphic design for 7 years. I create in programs from Adobe. I feel best in a minimalistic style.
ul: Create logo for you or your company

Why.desc: I know what it was like when I started out on my own. Open source projects often gave me the inspiration to create something of my own. Open source applications are created with the help of the community, for the community. Let's not forget

Tech.main: I believe that meeting the technical requirements is only half the battle. I have original, continuously refined tools for identifying complex design challenges. I am convinced that the right fit between technology and design is key to being able to confidently expand project horizons in the future.

Position.Title: Improve your position
Position.Desc: Strengthen your position with the right website SEO and a well-chosen brand development plan.

Speed.Title: Accelerate development
Speed.Desc: Spread your brand through the methods I have selected and you will certainly succeed in reaching new potential customers.

Stats.Title: Statistics
Stats.Desc: Have access to all website statistics thanks to the administration panel.

Stack.desc: VueJS - The technology makes it very easy to manage and create projects. VueJS is going from strength to strength thanks to which it has a growing support of developers.
NuxtJS - Is an advanced framework based on Vue.js that enables the creation of universal applications, both client-side and server-side.
TypeScript - This is an extension for JavaScript, which is known everywhere. Allows better and faster scripting in projects.
TailwindCSS - This is a CSS framework that allows you to quickly style a page. I use it to supplement my own CSS code
Netlify - this is the platform on which I share my projects. A simple yet sophisticated platform for publishing.
Codepen - Allows you to share parts of your code to share your ideas for solving problems in your code with others.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: This privacy policy sets out the rules for processing and protecting personal data provided by users in connection with the use of the Makoto.com.pl website and the contact form available on this site.

ul.desc: The administrator of personal data is Patryk Dąbrowski. For matters related to the protection of personal data, you can contact us at the following email address: contact@makoto.com.pl.

During the use of our website, we may collect the following personal data:
  • Data provided by the user in the contact form (e.g., name, surname, email address, phone number, message content).
  • Data collected automatically during the use of the website (IP address, browser type, operating system, visit time, visited subpages) using cookies and Google Analytics tools.

Users' personal data may be processed for the following purposes:
  • Responding to inquiries submitted via the contact form.
  • Adapting the content of the website to the users' needs and optimizing the use of the website.
  • Statistical analysis of website traffic using Google Analytics to improve the quality of services provided and better tailor website content to users' needs.

Personal data is processed based on the user's consent (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR), which the user expresses by filling out the contact form, and based on the legitimate interest of the administrator (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR) for the purpose of statistical analysis of website traffic.

Users' personal data is not shared with third parties, except in situations required by law. We may share personal data with entities we cooperate with in terms of website hosting, technical support, and other services supporting our business, to the extent necessary to provide these services.

Our website uses cookies. Cookies are used for:
  • Remembering user preferences.
  • Statistical analysis of website traffic using Google Analytics.
The user can manage cookies using their browser settings. At any time, the user can block the installation of cookies or remove already installed cookies.

Our website uses Google Analytics, which collects anonymous information about traffic on the site. This information is processed by Google Inc. to generate reports on user activity on the site. Google may transfer this personal data to other entities if required by law or if other entities process data on behalf of Google. More information about the Google Analytics privacy policy can be found here.

The user has the right to:
  • Access their personal data.
  • Rectify incorrect or incomplete data.
  • Delete data ('right to be forgotten').
  • Restrict data processing.
  • Object to data processing.
  • Data portability.
To exercise their rights, the user should contact the data administrator via email: contact@makoto.com.pl.
We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. Any changes will be published on this website.
If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@makoto.com.pl.
